够做一条连衣裙的布料
以一臂之远；在伸手可及之处
长度为；在长度上；在篇幅

bilingual.source: Make sure your video is the right length.
bilingual.target: 确保你的视频长度合适。

bilingual.source: That's about the length of 10 football pitches!
bilingual.target: 那大约是10个足球场的长度！

bilingual.source: When a bridge in Austin, Texas was repaired, engineers added small gaps running along the length of its bottom.
bilingual.target: 当德克萨斯州奥斯汀的一座桥修复时，工程师在桥底沿长度添加了小缝隙。
他有一个中等长度的头发。

bilingual.source: Measure the length of the table in cm.
bilingual.target: 用厘米测量桌子的长度。

bilingual.source: Measure the length of the table in inch.
bilingual.target: 用英寸测量桌子的长度。

bilingual.source: The length of the barrel affects the range.
The length is measured in units of meters.
bilingual.target: 长度以米为单位来测量。

bilingual.source: The length of the pencil is 15 centimeters.

list.abstract: length的中文意思是长度等。但广泛应用于各种编程语言中来查找某个字符或字符串的长度，常与string用在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: I agree. It's plainness is a virtue. And I'm sure we can do something about the length.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，朴素倒成了优点了，长度我们也能调整一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, guys, bad news. I just did a quick calculation. Given the size of the theater and the length of this line, we might not get seats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伙计们，坏消息，我刚刚算了一下，根据电影院的大小和队伍的长度我们可能没座位了。

yingyinNormal.en: A thousand horizontal wells have been sunk into the earth and then connected by canals over 3,000 miles in length, directing water from the Tian Shan mountain glaciers 100 miles to the north, to their fields and villages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数千个深入大地中的水平井，而后由长度唱过三千英里的运河连接，将一百六十公里外的天山冰川融水引入她们的田野与村庄。

yingyinNormal.en: I spoke at length last night with Governor Conway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我昨晚跟康威州长深谈过。

yingyinNormal.en: Here, we grow kombu, large seaweeds which can grow to three metres in length.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在这里种植海带，这是能长到3米长的大海藻。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you understand how creepy this is? Oh, yes, we discussed it at length last night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道这有多么的恐怖吗？是的，我们昨晚讨论了好久。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no possible way to answer that. A car length is not a standardized unit of measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有可能能回答这个问题，"车身长"不是个标准化的度量单位。

yingyinNormal.en: Laid out, its individual sections stretch for 13,000 miles, longer than the length of North and South America combined.
yingyinNormal.zh: 各个部分互相连接，蜿蜒两万多公里，比南北美的总长还长。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I'm warning you, I can play this game, too. If it's like your 3-D chess game, then you're out of your length, width and depth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我警告你，你玩的小把戏的我也会玩。如果你玩小把戏和玩三维象棋的水准一样，那你可是在三个维度上都不自量力。

yingyinNormal.en: See ya, boys. Bye. Bye. All right, got his enemies list. Ooh, he updated the interface. You can search by first name, last name or length of grudge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回见了各位。再见。好了，找到他的仇敌名单了。他更新了他的界面。可以按姓名，和怨恨的程度分别查找。

yingyinNormal.en: It's what we think caused your narcissistic personality disorder. We discussed it at length during our last video chat. Although how we got onto the subject of you is baffling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们认为正是这一点引起了你的自恋型人格障碍，我们上次视频聊天时详细地探讨了这个问题。虽然不知道为什么会提到你。

yingyinNormal.en: Turpan, home of the Uygur people, seen from the air is a dry and desolate dessert, dotted by thousands of mysterious pock marks, holes that lead to a two-thousand-year old subterranean system, that's longer than the length of India, the Karez canal network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吐鲁番是维吾尔族人的家园。俯瞰吐鲁番，是一片荒芜干燥的沙漠。数千个神秘的麻斑星罗棋布。这些洞是绵延至少两千多年的地下水系统，比整个印度还长——坎儿井运河系统。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 比较久的；较长的；（long的比较级）
n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

sense_info_list.en: the amount of time occupied by something

examination_example.sentence: Whichever approach, the key is to determine your <highlight>length</highlight> of focus time and stick to it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论采用哪种方法，关键在于确定你的聚焦时间并坚持到底。

sense_info_list.en: a piece or stretch of something
an extreme to which a course of action is taken

word_usage.usage:
短语at last和at length都有“最后，终于”之意，区别在于：
at last多指经主观努力，克服各种困难后才终于达到目的。
at length强调经历一段长时间后终于完成，侧重在时间部分。
at length还表示“详细地”，如“debate the subject at length展开详尽的辩论”。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些横梁构成了横跨大教堂中心部分的十字形屋顶。

examination_example.sentence: The plane stretches a total <highlight>length</highlight> of 54 meters, where experienced scuba divers will eventually be able to venture through the cabin and around the plane's exterior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这架飞机延伸的总长度为54米，经验丰富的潜水员最终将能在机舱内部和飞机外围冒险。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of time occupied by something

examination_example.sentence: We wanted to know if the <highlight>length</highlight> of time food is in contact with a contaminated surface affected the rate of transfer of bacteria to the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们想知道食物与受污染表面接触的时间长短是否会影响细菌向食物转移的速度。

examination_example.sentence: No matter how it happened, millions of Americans are putting their health, quality of life and even <highlight>length</highlight> of life in danger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论它是如何发生的，数以百万计的美国人正将他们的健康、生活质量甚至寿命置于危险之中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: The traffic signals along Factoria Boulevard in Bellevue, Washington, generally don't flash the same <highlight>length</highlight> of green twice in a row.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 华盛顿州贝尔维尤市Factoria大道上的交通信号灯一般不会连续两次闪现相同长度的绿色。

examination_example.sentence: Training for a marathon requires careful preparation and steady, gradual increases in the <highlight>length</highlight> of the runs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马拉松训练需要细心的准备和逐渐稳定增加的运动里程。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高
adj. 比较久的；较长的；（long的比较级）

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

examination_example.sentence: The network is expected to double in <highlight>length</highlight> again, to 70,000 kilometers, by 2035.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预计到2035年，该网络的长度将翻倍，达到70000公里。

examination_example.sentence: They also measure waves from crest to crest to determine (测定) the <highlight>length</highlight> of a wave.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还从波峰到波峰测量波浪，以确定波浪的长度。

examination_example.sentence: What is the meaning of "the <highlight>length</highlight> of a wave" according to paragraph 3?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据第3段，“the length of a wave”是什么意思?

sense_info_list.en: the amount of time that something lasts

examination_example.sentence: Studying long-living mammals is another way to prove the molecular(分 子) basis of extended ‘health <highlight>length</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究长寿的哺乳动物是证明延长“健康长度”的分子基础的另一种方式。
